citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 am to
10:55 am on 20-AUG-20.
Knocked on door. Called and left message for her to call me. No return call. Repeated 30 minutes later leaving
another voice mail message and left flyer at front door.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

another voice mail message and left flyer at front door.
